family_oriented.reason: Moderately family-friendly, suitable for older children but lacks specific kid-oriented amenities.

history_oriented.reason: No historical or cultural focus, purely recreational.

activity_oriented.reason: High activity level with walking, running, and navigating challenging terrain.

nature_oriented.reason: Set in a wooded area with natural scenery and trails, offering a nature-connected experience.

food_oriented.reason: No food vendors or dining options on-site, visitors bring their own snacks.

shopping_oriented.reason: No shopping opportunities, focused on recreational activities.
